data.eml:eml: Redescription of Bythotrephes arcticus Lilljeborg, 1901 (Crustacea: Cladocera: Onychopoda) and confirmation of an independent species status of the distant Transcaucasian populations of the genus Bythotrephes Leydig

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Korovchinsky, Nikolai M. (2016): Redescription of Bythotrephes arcticus Lilljeborg, 1901 (Crustacea: Cladocera: Onychopoda) and confirmation of an independent species status of the distant Transcaucasian populations of the genus Bythotrephes Leydig. Zootaxa 4138 (2): 247-270, DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4138.2.2
